item.title: Taming Service Dependencies with Aspire
item.description:
Tired of wrestling with local development environments? You're not alone. Setting up and maintaining local services‚Äîespecially a mix of cloud-native and legacy apps‚Äîis a common headache for developers. It's a time sink that slows down innovation and productivity. At Trayport, we're facing this exact challenge. Our solution? We're packaging our applications as Aspire integrations. In this talk, we'll walk you through our journey and show you how extending Aspire is transforming our development workflow.

item.title: What's the difference between an artist and a creator?
item.description:
In 1973, experimental filmmaker Hollis Frampton wrote a letter to MoMA that captures a paradox that still defines creative work today.¬†
